text:
Burger King Singapore has launched their new limited product, which is Cheesy Sour Cream Burgers which comes in both beef and chicken served in their famous long bun, smothered with sour cream, pieces of turkey bacon and a good layer of cheese.

I decided to opt for 2 burgers ala carte because I wanted to try the two different offerings and see which was worth the bite and interestingly, both are winners in their delights. The beef burger offers two radial patties and they pair well with the cream sauce whereas the chicken burger which compliments the crunchy turkey bacon well. Kudos!
One of my fav place to stop by before go work. Fast service. Only certain during peak hour service bit slow but it‚Äôs okay. Food was nice and always superb every time received.
I love the friendliness of the staffs and their speed. The environment is peaceful and clean. I am looking forward to buy at this store again.

Our all time favourite fast food after my son‚Äôs training. Cooling, Quiet and nice place to be in after a hot day! Hairi is very friendly and always with a big smile. Kudos to him for making us feel
Comfortable to dine. üôèüèº
